THe two remanding Sadistacons leave the brig and locks the 
door.  "No, UltraByte wanted us to report to the bridge."  Lady Right 
says.

About this time the Autoguns came online in the room.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Void exits the stasis hold as well and then waits for the rest of 
the 
> Sadistacon troops to exit.
> 
> Void: "I shall remain here and gaurd the door. noone shall be 
getting in 
> here."
